itunes:title: Some rise and some fall, take your opportunities
title: Some rise and some fall, take your opportunities
description:
If you live in the now, “more often than not” you’ll appreciate your opportunities more.. no matter how big or small, we have no idea when is our last opportunity- wether it’s to tell somebody we care, show somebody we love or kick some ass in Doha marathon.

Take your opportunities 

Support the show
content:encoded:
If you live in the now, “more often than not” you’ll appreciate your opportunities more.. no matter how big or small, we have no idea when is our last opportunity- wether it’s to tell somebody we care, show somebody we love or kick some ass in Doha marathon.

Take your opportunities 

Support the show
itunes:author: Stephen Scullion
itunes:keywords: Marathon, Nutrition, Food, Weight, Health, Self Discipline, Moderation, Balance
